tweet: CM @ncbn held a meeting with the Council of Ministers on Friday, where sanctioning of houses to working journalists was approved under NTR Urban Housing and BLC 2017.
Through the NTR Housing Scheme, government of AP is working towards constructing 19 Lac houses by 2019. We will ensure that shelter and a good lifestyle is provided to every citizen of the State.
Prioritising the welfare of the poor, AP govt has sanctioned 3 Lac houses with all facilities in the 2nd phase of the NTR housing scheme.
Follow the link for live updates from the Video Conference with Secretaries, HODs & Collectors.

Inaugurated 3 Lac houses under the NTR Housing Scheme at IGM Stadium, Vijayawada today. Houses with geo-tagging will provide shelter to the needy in Andhra Pradesh through this scheme. We aim at building 19 Lac houses with an investment of Rs. 50,000 Cr by the year 2019.
Live from NTR Samuhika Gruha Pravesaalu launching from IGMS, Vijayawada, @krishnadgoap

Inaugurated the Cancer Screening Bus today which will conduct medical tests in 9,930 villages. With medical support from @ManipalHealth, we will fight against cancer by using the latest technology for diagnosis of throat, uterus and breast cancer at an early stage.
